column2: Kandi Technologies Group, Inc. engages in the development, manufacture, and trade of vehicles. The company is headquartered in Jinhua, Zhejiang and currently employs 705 full-time employees. The Companyâ€™s products consist of EV parts, EV products, and off-road vehicles including ATVs, utility vehicles (UTVs), go-karts, and others vehicles. The firm operates its business both in the domestic market and overseas markets.
